nodes.bodyText: How about we use "opendistro.ad."+ AD_THREAD_POOL_NAME ? So we can know exactly which threadpool it maps to.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -346,10 +346,10 @@ private static Void initGson() {
             .singletonList(
                 new FixedExecutorBuilder(
                     settings,
-                    AD_JOB_THREAD_POOL_NAME,
+                    AD_THREAD_POOL_NAME,
                     Math.max(1, EsExecutors.numberOfProcessors(settings) / 4),
-                    AD_JOB_THEAD_POOL_QUEUE_SIZE,
-                    null
+                    AD_THEAD_POOL_QUEUE_SIZE,
+                    "opendistro.ad.ad_thread_pool"

@@ -346,10 +346,10 @@ private static Void initGson() {
             .singletonList(
                 new FixedExecutorBuilder(
                     settings,
-                    AD_JOB_THREAD_POOL_NAME,
+                    AD_THREAD_POOL_NAME,
                     Math.max(1, EsExecutors.numberOfProcessors(settings) / 4),
-                    AD_JOB_THEAD_POOL_QUEUE_SIZE,
-                    null
+                    AD_THEAD_POOL_QUEUE_SIZE,
+                    "opendistro.ad.ad_thread_pool"
